name: shelia reimer
text: I have had better frozen pizza.  The pizza was cold, it was burnt, and the cheese was something other than dairy.   NEVER again will I purchase from this place.  The receipt is at top of box, $15 and this was 40% off.  So very sad that this business would take advantage of people in this way.

name: Hawraah Mcallister
text: I absolutely love Papa John's  but this location is absolutely horrible!  They definitely need to learn customer service!  I seriously regret calling/pick-up every time.  Messed up on my order, didn't apologize and had me wait another 35 …More

name: Ard Brittony
text: Pizza taste okay. Garlic notes are great. Service isn't good. Wait time was longer then quoted.

name: J GE Finance Phoenix
text: Where should I start. I've given these guys the benefit of the doubt here. After ordering a dozen + times, I give up. The driver always zips through my neighborhood  ( a block full of children) music so loud it vibrates my windows. The food …More

name: Karee Lu
text: Generally I like most pizza, but due to dietary restrictions I chose a gluten free pizza with minimal topping (light sauce,  only parm cheese, hamburger and ham, and some veggies).  Gluten free can go two ways, tasty or cardboard, Papa …More

name: Karl k916
text: If they say 45 mins. Expect it to be closer to 90 mins. This establishment can't seem to give a proper time frame. If it wasn't for the fact that it is papa John's pizza I would never buy from them again. They really need to retrain their employees, especially in time management.

name: Tony Brown
text: The best pizza I've had in a long time

name: Princess of the Cape
text: Hard to understand what everyone is complaining about - I've eaten here like 5 times now, and it is exactly what it was advertised as: Papa John's Pizza. It's a chain, folks - chains are pretty much identical.

name: Daniel Hackett
text: Last 2 times order was undercooked and once they put canned mushrooms on instead of fresh. The one on waddell was way better

name: Angelica Smith
text: wish I could give no stars they are so terrible and the manager was even more rude!! we were told an hour for delivery and it has now been an hour and 37 minutes and we called and she said ok well sorry what do you want me to say?? horrible customer service and very childish staff. NEVER ORDER FROM HERE

name: John Hengstler
text: Great pizza and service

name: Mckenna Family
text:
Waste of hard earned money.
The driver almost hit my 5 year old. Not happy. My neighborhood is boycotting this place for the safety of our neighborhood.

name: Dennis Buchannan
text: The thin crustis the way to go. The handtossed is good and the new bbq pork pizza is decent I love how you get the garlic sauce it is really good. I remember when they sold ice cream, that was weird.

name: Rosalina Espinoza
text: Lady cared more about her food cost than me paying for the food. I wasn't aware that we couldn't use two promotions for one order. I asked if i can just do two transactions but said no cause it will mess up her food cost. So I left with nothing cause that wasn't good costumer service.

name: Angel E Sumeta
text: Love it great ingredients great ingredients great news and always fresh and with a smile

name: Anthony Portz
text: Good value pizza

name: Kenya Cooper
text: Recipe has changed... loved it

name: Kristen Brinkley
text: Pizza sauce is sweet and quality is lacking

name: Bethany Bishop
text: Great food and service

name: Lynn Pfeifer
text: Great pizza and pleasant staff!

name: Linzy Eaton
text: Good food, clean and good serve

name: Machelle Craig
text: Great pizza

name: Lisa Judelson
text: pizza was great and delivery was quick!!!

name: Mark Pearson
text: Very good pizza

name: Terri Wagner
text: Good, fresh pizza

name: Todd Metivier
text: Way too expensive for a small pizza. Paid $13 for what was a lunch.

name: Lynn Shawback
text: Hated it

name: Emily Boogaard
text: Took 2 hours to get my pizza. 1 star.
